row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Owner" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_OWNER# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_OWNER#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX
errors=0
if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Path '&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#' doesn't exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR errors=1 fi
! Check EXT: in value :IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 exit 100 :ENDIF
! stop execution if validation errors occurred if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then exit 1 fi
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
chown &UC4RB_FILE_OWNER# "&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
